key_findings.description: Letters require both approver approval and authorized signatory signature before completion
key_findings.impact: Users must understand the multi-step approval workflow

key_findings.description: Letters feature is not integrated with Bayzat's workflow automation system
key_findings.impact: Users cannot create automated workflows for letter request events (created, approved, rejected)

key_findings.description: Letter requests are organized into three main status tabs: Pending (869), Approved (24), Rejected (78)
key_findings.impact: Users can efficiently filter and manage letters by their approval status

key_findings.description: Letter detail view includes embedded PDF preview of the actual letter content
key_findings.impact: Users can review letter content without downloading, improving efficiency

key_findings.description: Delete action visible on rejected letters but payload warns 'Deleted letter requests cannot be recovered by users'
key_findings.impact: Users should be cautious when deleting letters as recovery requires backend intervention

key_findings.description: Letter Template field is read-only after creation. Only 'Letter Addressed To', notes, and attachments can be modified.
key_findings.impact: Users cannot change the letter template once a request is created. They must delete and recreate if wrong template selected.

key_findings.finding: DELETE restricted to rejected letters only
key_findings.description: Delete button only appears on letters in Rejected status. Pending and Approved letters cannot be deleted.
key_findings.impact: Users must reject a letter before they can delete it. No delete option for pending or approved letters.

key_findings.finding: Search, Filter, and Pagination fully functional
key_findings.description: All list management features work correctly with proper URL parameter updates and accurate result counts
key_findings.impact: Users can efficiently search, filter by department/office/date, and navigate large datasets

key_findings.description: Full WYSIWYG document editor with 80+ dynamic variables across 8 categories (Common, Personal, Work, Document, Payroll, Contact, Signatory, Custom Fields)
key_findings.impact: Highly flexible letter template creation supporting complex business requirements including payroll details, document IDs, and custom fields

key_findings.description: Authorized signatories upload signature images (120x80px) which are automatically embedded in generated PDFs
key_findings.impact: Enables legally compliant digital signing without manual signature addition, streamlines approval process

key_findings.description: Complete workflow: Submit request → Approver reviews → Authorized Signatory signs → Download PDF with embedded signature and variable-substituted content
key_findings.impact: Full business process documented and validated, ready for user training and documentation

known_limitations.description: Letters feature does not appear in workflow triggers or actions
Confirmed: Delete confirmation dialog states 'This letter request will be deleted forever.'

known_limitations.description: UPDATE form shows Letter Template field as disabled. Users must delete and recreate if wrong template selected.
known_limitations.workaround: Double-check template selection before submitting letter request

known_limitations.limitation: DELETE only available on rejected letters
known_limitations.description: Delete button only appears on Rejected tab. Cannot delete pending or approved letters.
known_limitations.workaround: Reject a letter first if deletion is needed
